addr: 6476 Santa Monica Blvd Los Angeles, CA 90038
title: L.A Rex Acting Studio (technique and scene study classes)
desc: Welcome to  L.A Rex Acting Studio . Located at? The Complex? in the heart of theatre row in?Hollywood, California, the studio offers an integrated acting?technique and scene study course, that caters to students of all levels.? Classes begin Wednesday night Novemeber 4th at 6pm and will run till the end of January (27th) for a total of 11 weeks. There will be a 2 week break over the holidays. Please visit www.larexactingstudio.com for more information regarding the details of the classes.? Australian actor James Stratton says,? "Luke has a unique, non technique specific method in his teachings which are truly inspirational and thoroughly enjoying to participate in. His classes harmoniously balance relaxation, technique and scene work, which give an actor so much to explore and relish. Whether a working actor wanting to study, beginners, or even people wanting to re kindle the old artistic flame, Luke's teaching's are accessible, practical and engaging to all levels. I have been challenged and liberated in my time studying under Luke and have had many tools illuminated in my repertoire as an actor. His fascination with the human condition and open minded passion for acting is a rarity." We look forward to seeing you at the studio!
